articles.author: Adam Zagoria
articles.title: Like Its Players, Villanova Keeps Coming Back - The New York Times
articles.description: Under Coach Jay Wright, the Wildcats have made four Final Fours and won two national titles, all without any one-and-done players.

articles.author: Ben Church, CNN
articles.title: Naomi Osaka reaches first tennis final since 2021 - CNN
articles.description: Naomi Osaka reached the Miami Open final after beating Belinda Bencic in a comeback win on Thursday.
